name: Egret Harpy
description: The Egret Harpy has a humanoid upper body and avian lower body, with wings allowing for flight. It possesses a strong and enchanting voice, often captivating those who listen.
memorable: The harpy's enchanting songs can charm foes and assist allies in navigating marshy terrain, creating unique tactical opportunities.
goals: To capture or charm intruders and enhance the effectiveness of its allies in combat and navigation.
relations: Commonly found in marshy areas, it might be encountered alongside other marsh-dwelling creatures or allied with other harpies.
environment: Typically inhabits marshes and wetlands where it can utilize its special abilities and flyers.
strengths: Versatile abilities in both melee and magic, innate spellcasting, and support for allies in difficult terrains.
weaknesses: Moderate armor class makes it vulnerable to coordinated attacks despite its hit points.
attacks: Can execute a multiattack with a spear and talons, using magical songs to influence combat.
most_powerful_ability: Guiding Song enhances allies' navigation and allows for area-wide charm effects through Mass Suggestion.
skills: Skilled in Acrobatics and Nature, allowing it to navigate and understand its environment effectively.
additional_information: Innate spellcasting ability allows for three uses of Suggestion per day.
Wing Buffet can knock prone and deals significant area damage.
Advantage on Survival checks in marshy areas benefits allies greatly.
Utilizes a strategy of enchanting foes while supporting allies.
Versatile combat capabilities with both melee and ranged options.
spellcasting: Can cast Suggestion three times per day without materials, and has access to Mass Suggestion through its Guiding Song.
test_queries: harpy known for its supportive abilities
creature that uses magic in combat
